description: Police say the lab, built in a converted stables, is the largest ever found in the Netherlands.
title: Netherlands' largest cocaine lab found in former riding school
title_page: Netherlands' largest cocaine lab found in former riding school - BBC News
maintext: They also found 120 tonnes of what they described as "carrier material" in the central city of Apeldoorn. This was described as mostly clothing which can be laced with cocaine. The drug is then removed in a chemical process once at its destination.
